data.name: One Shot
data.detailed_description:
A powerful, rapidly growing zombie horde threatens the very existence of humankind, and the only ones capable of fighting back are the highly skilled. Choose from 3 characters, maximize the fully customizable look, and select from tons of weapons to build the ultimate zombie killing hero. Play dynamic, challenging levels in single player or 4 player multiplayer and give our ravaged civilization its last best hope for survival.


UNBEATABLE 5 PLAYER Deathmatch
Quick match with up to 4 other players of similar level and use the custom skills and weapons chosen by all players.

data.short_description: online multiplayer game, kill zombie and win others to get new items.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel I7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal
